name: fluoresce
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to absorb light of a short wavelength and produce light of a longer wavelength, particularly when this produces a very bright colour that can be seen in the dark: This material fluoresces under ultraviolet light which makes it easier to identify. The coral fluoresces orange.
More examplesFewer examplesUnder black light the substance will fluoresce.The eyes of the insect fluoresce green.As these compounds fluoresce under ultraviolet light they are easily detected.These enzymes, obtained from jellyfish, make a protein that fluoresces bright green in UV light.The mineral fluoresces yellow or white under shortwave ultraviolet radiation and orange or red under longwave.
